thread.title: Dubai tests autonomous pods in drive for smart city

title: Dubai tests autonomous pods in drive for smart city
text:
Dubai tests autonomous pods in drive for smart city Friday, March 02, 2018 - 01:19 
Dubai's transport authority tests science-fiction inspired autonomous pods, as the Gulf city strives to lead the in innovative transportation. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Dubai's transport authority tests science-fiction inspired autonomous pods, as the Gulf city strives to lead the in innovative transportation. David Pollard reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2oJUIuZ
